How to Play

 Welcome to Five Nights Escape! Your goal is to survive as long as possible while avoiding monsters on the map. Here s how to play:

 Basics
 - The game revolves around surviving and escaping monsters that appear on the map.
 - You start with 3 hearts.
 - Your goal is to survive as long as possible.

 Difficulty
 - Choose your difficulty level in the main menu. The difficulty determines how often more challenging monsters spawn.

 Gameplay
 - The game utilizes the Google Maps API to track your position and update monster movement accordingly.
 - Hearts: You start with 3 hearts. Your task is to keep them throughout the game.
 - Timer: Track how long you ve survived.
 - Level Indicator: Display your current level on the main UI.

 Monsters
 - Monsters spawn based on random chances at fixed intervals. There are three types:
 - Standing Monster: Attacks if you enter its visual range.
 - Chasing Monster: Pursues you until you re out of its alert distance.
 - Wandering Monster: Moves randomly and attacks if a player is detected nearby.

 Game Over
 - Once you run out of hearts, you die, going back to the start menu and losing all progress towards your run.

 Get Started
 - Choose Difficulty: Select your preferred difficulty level.
 - Start the Game: Press the Start button to begin your escape, or swipe from left to right.

 Tips
 - Keep an eye on your hearts; losing them means game over.
 - Use the map to plan your escape routes.
 - Higher difficulty levels bring more challenging monsters.

 Survive as long as you can, and good luck escaping the Five Nights monsters!
